text: Na khambhakato antaraghare nisīdissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā
edit: Na khambhakato antaraghare nisīdissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā

translations.transtext: 22. I will not sit with arms akimbo in inhabited areas: a training to be observed.
๒๒. พึงทำศึกษาว่า”เราจักไม่ทำความค้ำนั่งในละแวกบ้าน”
22. I shall not sit with arms akimbo in inhabited areas: this is a training to be done.
